Member Function Documentation

virtual bool icam::ITriggerConstraints::IsTriggerModeSupported ( int  triggerMode  )  const [pure virtual]

Check if specified trigger mode is supported.

Default mode should be always supported. Normal trigger modes are defined in icam::ITriggerParams::TriggerMode.

Implemented in iavt::CFireGrabAcquisitionComp, icam::CAcquisitionConstraintsComp, iocv::COcvAcquisitionComp, and isgige::CGenicamCameraComp.

virtual bool icam::ITriggerConstraints::IsTriggerSupported (  )  const [pure virtual]

Check if trigger enabling/disabling is supported.

Please note, that for implementations using only triggered acuisition it should return also false.

Implemented in iavt::CFireGrabAcquisitionComp, icam::CAcquisitionConstraintsComp, iocv::COcvAcquisitionComp, and isgige::CGenicamCameraComp.
